title: bugsplat
body: ever since i updated the league client open beta, i keep getting bugspalt over and over again, i got into a game and once i got to the loading screen my screen would keep turning off and on i tried after exiting and reconectin several times the problem who still continue then in the logging screen i pressed 'launch legacy client' and i was able t go back into the game without any problem, is the new client broken or does this happen only to me and if it does please help me fix this prob

replies.body: It sounds like an update might not have completed properly, so some files may have messed up and can't render the game.  Even if you were able to return to the legacy client, there is a chance that you might see a crash expectantly.  I'd rather you be safe than sorry in this case, so when you get a chance I'd recommend a [reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).  This will get you back to the standalone legacy client.  You can then re-download the updated client from there.  I hope that helps!
